document.heading: Youth Rehabilitation Amendment Act of 1985 Temporary Amendment Act of 1991

history.narrative: Law 9-7, the “Youth Rehabilitation Amendment Act of 1985 Temporary Amendment Act of 1991,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-99. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 5, 1991, and March 5, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 15, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-13 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
